Math.text: list@(X, X ^ Y, X / Y, X, X, X, x, x, x, x)
list@(x, x, x, x)
list@(absolutevalue@(a), absolutevalue@(a), absolutevalue@(X / Y), norm@(a), norm@(a), norm@(X / Y))
list@(evaluatedat@(x, 0, infinity), evaluatedat@(x, 0, infinity), evaluatedat@(x, 0, infinity), evaluatedat@((sum _ (X = 0)) ^ N, 0, infinity), evaluatedat@((sum _ (X = 0)) ^ N, 0, infinity))
list@(order@(x ^ 2), order@(x ^ 2), order@(X / Y), commutator@(A, B), commutator@(A, B), commutator@(A, X / Y), anticommutator@(A, B), poissonbracket@(A, B))
list@(a, a, overrightarrow@(a), overrightarrow@(a), hat@(a), hat@(a))
list@(dotproduct, crossproduct, crossproduct)
list@(gradient, gradient@(Psi), gradient@(Psi + X ^ Y), gradient@(Psi + X ^ Y))
list@(divergence, divergence@(a), divergence@(a + X ^ Y), divergence@(a + X ^ Y))
list@(curl, curl@(a), curl@(a + X ^ Y), curl@(a + X ^ Y))
list@(laplacian, laplacian@(Psi), laplacian@(Psi + X ^ Y), laplacian@(Psi + X ^ Y))
list@(sine@(X / Y), (power@(sine, 2))@(x), sine@(x))
list@(sine@(X / Y), sine@(x) * delimited-[]@(X / Y), (power@(sine, x))@(X / Y), sine@(X / Y), sine@(x) * set@(X / Y))
list@(exponential@(X ^ Y), logarithm@(X ^ Y), naturallogarithm@(X ^ Y), determinant@(X ^ Y), Probability@(X ^ Y))
list@(trace@(rho), trace@(X ^ Y), trace@(rho), rank@(M), errorfunction@(x), residue@(f * z))
list@(principalvalue@(integral@(f * z * differential@(z))), principalvalue@(integral@(f * z * differential@(z))), realpart@(z), real-part, imagpart@(z), imaginary-part)
list@(realpart@(X / Y), realpart@(X / Y), imagpart@(X / Y), imagpart@(X / Y))
delimited-[]@([ word or phrase ]) * delimited-[]@([word or phrase ])

Math.tex: [,\quad],[\mbox{\quad c.c.\quad}],[\mbox{\quad if\quad}],[\mbox{\quad then% \quad}],[\mbox{\quad else\quad}],[\mbox{\quad otherwise\quad}],[\mbox{\quad unless% \quad}],[\mbox{\quad given\quad}]

[\mbox{\quad using\quad}],[\mbox{\quad assume\quad}],[\mbox{\quad since\quad}]% ,[\mbox{\quad let\quad}],[\mbox{\quad for\quad}],[\mbox{\quad all\quad}],[% \mbox{\quad even\quad}],[\mbox{\quad odd\quad}],
Math.text: list@(delimited-[]@([ using ]), delimited-[]@([ assume ]), delimited-[]@([ since ]), delimited-[]@([ let ]), delimited-[]@([ for ]), delimited-[]@([ all ]), delimited-[]@([ even ]), delimited-[]@([ odd ]))
list@(delimited-[]@([ integer ]), delimited-[]@([ and ]), delimited-[]@([ or ]), delimited-[]@([ as ]), delimited-[]@([ in ]))
list@(differential, differential@(x), differential@(x), (functional-power@(differential, 3))@(x), differential@(cosine@(theta)))
list@(derivative@(x), (derivative@(x))@(f), (derivative@(x))@(f), (derivative@(x, n))@(f), (derivative@(x))@(X / Y), (derivative@(x))@(f))

list@(partialderivative@(x), (partialderivative@(x))@(f), partialderivative@(x), (partialderivative@(x))@(f), (partialderivative@(x, n))@(f), (partialderivative@(x))@(X / Y), (partialderivative@(x))@(f))
list@(variation@(F * delimited-[]@(g * x)), variation@(E - T * S), functionalderivative@(g), (functionalderivative@(g))@(F), (functionalderivative@(V))@(E - T * S), (functionalderivative@(x))@(F))
(functional-power@(differential, 2))@(delimited-[]@(X / Y))

para.p: And multiple derivatives, sorta; But only for partial:

Math.text: list@(((partialderivative@(x))@(partialderivative@(y)))@(f), ((partialderivative@(x))@(partialderivative@(y)))@(f) * z, ((partialderivative@(x))@(partialderivative@(y)))@(f) * z, (partialderivative@(y))@(x))
list@((derivative@(x))@(f) * y, (functionalderivative@(f))@(F) * g)
innerproduct@(phi, psi) * [ as opposed to ] * bra@(phi) * ket@(psi)
formulae@(bra@(phi) * outerproduct@(psi, xi), [ as opposed to ] * innerproduct@(phi, psi) * bra@(xi))
list@(ket@(X ^ Y), ket@(X ^ Y), bra@(X ^ Y), bra@(X ^ Y))
list@(innerproduct@(phi, psi), innerproduct@(phi, X ^ Y), innerproduct@(phi, X ^ Y), innerproduct@(phi, X ^ Y), innerproduct@(phi, X ^ Y))
list@(innerproduct@(a, b), innerproduct@(a, a), innerproduct@(a, X ^ Y), innerproduct@(a, X ^ Y))
list@(innerproduct@(a, b), outerproduct@(a, b), outerproduct@(a, a), outerproduct@(a, X ^ Y), outerproduct@(a, X ^ Y), outerproduct@(a, b))

list@(outerproduct@(a, b), expectationvalue@(A), expectationvalue@(A, Psi, Psi), expectationvalue@(A, Psi, Psi), expectationvalue@(X / Y, Psi, Psi), expectationvalue@(X / Y, X ^ Y, X ^ Y), expectationvalue@(X / Y, Psi, Psi))
list@(expectationvalue@(A, n, m), expectationvalue@(A, n, m), expectationvalue@(X / Y, n, m), expectationvalue@(X / Y, n, X ^ Y), expectationvalue@(X / Y, n, m))
matrix[[matrix[[1, 0], [0, 1]], matrix[[a], [b]]], [matrix[[c, d]], e]]
matrix[[matrix[[1, 0], [0, 1]], matrix[[a], [b]]], [matrix[[c, d]], e]]
matrix[[matrix[[1, 0], [0, 1]], matrix[[x / y], [b]]], [matrix[[u + v + w + x + y + z, d]], e]]

list@(matrix[[a, b], [c, d]], matrix[[a, b], [c, d]], matrix[[a, b], [c, d]], matrix[[a, b], [c, d]], matrix[[a, b], [c, d]], Array[[a, b], [c, d]], determinant@(matrix[[a, b], [c, d]]), determinant@(Array[[a, b], [c, d]]))
list@(Array[[1, 0], [0, 1]], Array[[0, 1], [1, 0]], Array[[0, - imaginary-unit], [imaginary-unit, 0]], Array[[1, 0], [0, - 1]])

list@(matrix[[1, absent, absent], [absent, 2, absent], [absent, absent, 3]], matrix[[1, 0], [0, 2]], matrix[[1, absent], [absent, matrix[[2, 3], [4, 5]]]], matrix[[absent, absent, 1], [absent, 2, absent], [3, absent, absent]])
